mention.text: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
director of the Overseas Development Council in Washington -LRB- The IMF was equally short-sighted
a total debt burden today of some Dollars 1,341 bn compared with a relatively manageable Dollars 639bn in 1980 ` The bank failed to take a timely leadership position on the debt crisis
The result of delay and compound interest
public subsidies for Third World entrepreneurs
